choices: Your a body part of a Pokémon
1.content: You wake up. You are super exited about getting your first Pokémon today. You then go down stares to eat some breakfast. You look up to your dad since he was once a Pokémon trainer just like you will be soon. You then finish you breakfast and put on your green gloves and red poke ball backpack and your poke ball hat and head outside to go to proffeser oaks labritory. You then get to proffesor oaks lab after a lot of walking. You then begin to feel woozy and you fall to the ground and black out. When you wake up again you feel something is different about you. You then realize?
1.title: Gotta catch them all

11.content: You then realize that you have become a Pokémon. You then begin to freak out from this. You then calm yourself down and try and put this all together. You then notice you are a?
11.title: Your a pokemon

111.content: You then realize that you are a pikachu like the ones you have seen in the wild. You then try to speak but all that comes out is pika pikachu. You then hear someone say oh look a wild pikachu guess I had better catch it. Who said that?
111.title: Pikachu

1111.content: But which member of team rocket is it?
1111.title: Team rocket

choices: You get shown to the rest of team rocket
Jessie uses you for some fun first
11111.content: You then see Jessie the leader of team rocket behind you. Oh I have allwase wanted a pikachu for myself but the boss won’t let me Jessie says. She then sends out her arbok to battle you. Alright arbok use poison says jessie. Arbok then attacks you and weakens you enough for Jessie to catch you. Jessie then catch’s you in a pokeball. Yes I cought it james will be so jelious. What happens next?
11111.title: Jessie

115.content: What else could you be?
115.title: Other

1151.content: You then realize that you are a ditto. You think to yourself wow this is super cool. You then begin to walk around in the forest. You then get a idea why not prank some people or Pokémon well you are a ditto. You then think that that is a great idea making Pokémon and people think you are different kinds of Pokémon. You then think I could also use this ability to fight or play with other Pokémon too. You then desire it would be much more fun to go and either fight or play with other Pokémon. So you go and try to find other Pokémon to play or fight with in the forest. You keep walking along the trail when you hear a rustling in a bush near by. You try to Ignore it and continue on your way. You then get to a open clearing that has lots of Pokémon playing in it you see Pokémon ranging from muk to eevee to pikachu. You then think to yourself what Pokémon should I become. You think on this for a while. You then get a idea why don’t I become a female Pokémon and play with them. You think that is genius. You then turn into a female Pokémon but which one do you become though?
1151.title: A ditto

choices: Nurse joy finds you and helps you
You get more and more pregnant as the days go by
11511.content: You then transform into a female pikachu. And walk out into the clearing where all the other Pokémon are. A male pikachu then comes up to you and looks at you with lust in it’s eyes. It then goes behind you and mounts you. You think what is happening right now. The pikachu then begins to mate with you. And it soon cums inside you. It then gets off you and leaves. (50 years later) you then feel a little numb in your belly. You then realize that you have become pregnant because of the male pikachu. What happens next?
11511.title: A female pikachu

11513.content: What other female Pokémon could you become?
11513.title: Other

115132.content: You then turn into a female muk and go into the open clearing. The male muk then sees you and comes over to you. But what you didn’t know is muk’s eat each other to breed. The male muk then opens its mouth wide enough to fit you inside it. The muk then eats you. You are now inside the muk and are being absorbed by it. The muk then absorbs you fully and grows bigger. You are now part of the muk forever (the end)
115132.title: A female muk

12.content: You then wake up and realize that you can’t move. You then figure out you are a body part of a Pokémon. Which Pokémon are you a body part of though?
12.title: Your a body part of a Pokémon

121.content: You then realize your a body part of a pikachu but what body part of the pikachu are you?
121.title: A pikachu

122.content: You then realize your a body part of a squirtal. but what body part of the squirtal are you?
122.title: A squirtal

125.content: What other Pokémon could you be a body part of?
125.title: Other

13.content: You then realize that you can’t move. You then think to yourself what could I possibly have become. You then realize you are a?
13.title: You a inanimate object

132.content: You then realize your a piece of Pokémon food. You then hear a Pokémon but you don’t know which one it is. You then see the Pokémon and it is a?
132.title: Pokemon food

15.content: What else could you be?
15.title: Other
